item.title: IrDude – A simple android app to control my stereo via IR
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: I recently wrote a simple Android App which allows me to control my HarmonKardon Avr-35 stereo remotely via IR. Presenting: IrDude. It uses the an undocumented Samsung IR API, so its unfortunately very much tight to Samsung galaxy note 10.1 tablet. Nevertheless, it does the Job for my, and is hopefully a good starting point […]
item.content:encoded:
I recently wrote a simple Android App which allows me to control my HarmonKardon Avr-35 stereo remotely via IR. Presenting: IrDude.

It uses the an undocumented Samsung IR API, so its unfortunately very much tight to Samsung galaxy note 10.1 tablet. Nevertheless, it does the Job for my, and is hopefully a good starting point for other to do similar. Check http://www.remotecentral.com to find hex codes to support other devices.

https://github.com/rngtng/IrDude

[image from IR PUCK]

item.title: Here it is: Launchpad Processing lib!
item.dc:creator: tobi
item.description: Yay, I finally released my Launchpad Processing Library. Please see it’s project page and source at github. Videos & more are coming soon. (Yes, this includes an updated mtXcontrol Version with Launchpad support!!)
item.content:encoded:
Yay, I finally released my Launchpad Processing Library. Please see it’s project page and source at github.

Videos & more are coming soon. (Yes, this includes an updated mtXcontrol Version with Launchpad support!!)
